alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 6:10AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marengo, southwestern Greene and southern Sumter Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 610 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near York, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Demopolis, Livingston, York, Jefferson, Forkland, Boligee, Epes, The University Of West Alabama, Thornhill, Dug Hill, Tishabee, Allison, Bluffport, Coatopa, Old Mallard Airport, U.S. 80 and AL 28, Belmont, Demopolis Lock And Dam, McDowell and Bellamy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
